name: llama-cookbook (meta-llama)
description: [项目级] Welcome to the Llama Cookbook! This is your go to guide for Building with Llama: Getting started with Inference, Fine-Tuning, RAG. We also show you how to solve end to end problems using Llama model family and using them on various provider services  。来源: https://github.com/meta-llama/llama-cookbook

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Welcome to the Llama Cookbook! This is your go to guide for Building with Llama: Getting started with Inference, Fine-Tuning, RAG. We also show you how to solve end to end problems using Llama model family and using them on various provider services  

来源: https://github.com/meta-llama/llama-cookbook
语言: Jupyter Notebook
Stars: 18207
